<a id="InputEventMagnifyGesture"></a>

# InputEventMagnifyGesture

**Inherits:** [InputEventGesture](InputEventGesture.md) **\<** [InputEventWithModifiers](InputEventWithModifiers.md) **\<** [InputEventFromWindow](InputEventFromWindow.md) **\<** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a magnifying touch gesture.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores the factor of a magnifying touch gesture. This is usually performed when the user pinches the touch screen and used for zooming in/out.

\ **Note:** On Android, this requires the [ProjectSettings.input_devices/pointing/android/enable_pan_and_scale_gestures](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_input_devices/pointing/android/enable_pan_and_scale_gestures) project setting to be enabled.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventMagnifyGesture_property_factor"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **factor** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventMagnifyGesture_property_factor)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_factor**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_factor**\ (\ )

The amount (or delta) of the event. This value is closer to ``1.0`` the slower the gesture is performed.
